explanation: [0-0] A young man stands in front of a beige curtain with a pattern of blue and green squares. He wears a black top with red patterns and English letters. The man holds a small silver object in his right hand and looks to the left of the camera.

[0-4] The man pulls down an accessory on the silver object with his left hand. Then, the scene switches to a first-person perspective in the desert holding a sniper rifle. The hand pulls the bolt to chamber a round. The background is blurred.
